disclaimerStep.description: Please read and acknowledge the following before proceeding:
disclaimerStep.disclaimerText1: 123LegalDoc is not a law firm and does not provide legal advice.
disclaimerStep.disclaimerText2: The information and documents provided are for informational purposes only and should not be substituted for advice from a licensed attorney.
disclaimerStep.disclaimerText3: You are responsible for the accuracy of the information you provide and for reviewing the final document to ensure it meets your specific needs.

home.hero.title: Your AI Legal Assistant. Documents Ready in Minutes.
home.hero.subtitle: Eliminate guesswork. Create fully customized, professional legal documents in minutes.
home.hero2.title: Your Legal Forms. Expertly Crafted.
home.hero2.subtitle: Eliminate guesswork. Create fully customized, professional legal documents in minutes.
home.hero2.trustline: Trusted by 1,640,200+ docs generated • SSL Secure Checkout • Templates Reviewed by Legal Pros • Trustpilot ★★★★★
howItWorks.sectionTitle: Create, Edit and Print Your Document in Minutes
home.steps.step1.descUpdated: Choose from 1,000+ state-specific templates built on up-to-date statutes & best practices.
home.steps.step1.title: Tell Us Your Needs
home.steps.step1.desc: Answer a few quick prompts for tailored guidance.
home.steps.step2.descUpdated: Fill in simple fields—no legal expertise needed. As you answer plain-language questions, your document populates in real time. Then edit any clause or section until it’s exactly what you need.
home.steps.step2.title: AI Crafts Your Document
home.steps.step2.desc: Our system builds a professional draft automatically.
home.steps.step3.title: Securely Download & Share
home.steps.step3.descUpdated: Once you’ve double-checked every detail, hit “Complete.” Your polished PDF is ready to download, print, or share via a protected link—controlled by you, accessible to anyone you choose.
home.steps.step3.desc: Your final document is ready to print or send.
home.trustStrip.title: Trusted By Professionals
home.testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
home.testimonials.t1.quote: Incredibly intuitive! This platform saved me countless hours and thousands in legal fees for my startup. The AI suggestions were spot on and let me launch with full confidence.
home.testimonials.t1.name: Sarah L.
home.testimonials.t1.title: Startup Founder, Tech Solutions Inc.
home.testimonials.t2.quote: Needed a residential lease agreement fast. The step-by-step wizard produced a thorough document that covered every detail. Highly recommend!
home.testimonials.t2.name: Michael B.
home.testimonials.t2.title: Landlord & Real Estate Investor
home.testimonials.t2.outcome: Secured a new tenant in days!
home.testimonials.t3.quote: As a freelance designer, contracts are vital. The guided questionnaire made it simple to generate professional NDAs and service agreements, so I can focus on the creative work.
home.testimonials.t3.name: Jessica P.
home.testimonials.t3.title: Freelance Graphic Designer
home.testimonials.t4.quote: The variety of documents is impressive-from bills of sale to power of attorney. It's become my go-to legal resource, and the Spanish translations are a huge plus for my clients!
home.testimonials.t4.name: Robert D.
home.testimonials.t4.title: Small Business Owner, Retail
home.testimonials.t5.quote: I created my last will without any confusion. The process was clear and reassuring during a sensitive time and gave my family real peace of mind.
home.testimonials.t5.name: Emily R.
home.testimonials.t5.title: Teacher & Parent
